column1: Elephant lived in a house on one side of the palace. Chameleon lived on the other side. At this time
column2: there was a terrible drought across the land. The king had an idea and called his two neighbors to the palace. The king said to Elephant and Chameleon
column3: "I want you to stomp on the ground with your feet until water comes out." The king promised a large reward to the one who succeeded. Chameleon had no hope since he was very small. Elephant was extremely happy since he was so big and powerful. Elephant went to the field and started stomping on the ground. A lot of dust came
column4: but no water. Elephant stomped on the ground until water was almost coming out
column5: but he was too tired. He gave Chameleon a chance to try. Chameleon started stomping on the ground. After a short while
column6: water came out. People could not believe their eyes!
